Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils

Class CharacterPrinter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.utils.CharacterPrinter
public class CharacterPrinter extends Object
CharacterPrinter role is to create every single box for specific character, after the creation all the created boxes are reunited by a single grid map by CharacterMapPrinter
See Also:
  • CharacterMapPrinter

    • setExpertField

      public void setExpertField(ExpertFieldView expertField)
      Sets the value of the expert field that this printer will use to print characters
      Parameters:
      expertField - the expert field used

    • loadCharacterSkeleton

      public String[][] loadCharacterSkeleton()
      loadCharacterSkeleton create the characters boxes (just the structure) and return the value that will be used by CharacterPrinter
      Returns:
      built boxes

    • getCharacter

      public String[][] getCharacter(int characterId)
      Returns the character box of the character that have specified id. The method filled the character skeleton with the dynamics part of the characters
      Parameters:
      characterId - id of the character
      Returns:
      specific character box for every character

    • getCharacterWithStudent

      private void getCharacterWithStudent(int characterId)
      getCharacterWithStudents fills the character boxes that have to contain students with students
      Parameters:
      characterId - id of the character

    • getCharacterWithNoEntryTile

      private void getCharacterWithNoEntryTile()
      getCharacterWithNoEntryTile fills the character boxes that have to contain no_entry_tiles with no_entry_tiles

    • getCharacterWithoutNothing

      private void getCharacterWithoutNothing()
      getCharacterWithoutNothing fills the character boxes that doesn't have to contain no_entry_tiles or students just with spaces
